title: Completed PE Summary - Pheonix
raw_html:
Category Fishing
Registered Owner & Manager: Mr Rodney Bowes
Port of registry: Colchester
Flag: UK
Type: Fish catching processing
Construction: Steel
Length overall: 9.85
Gross tonnage: 7.69
Date & Time 29/10/03 15:44
Location of incident: River
Incident Type: Capsize/Listing
Persons onboard: 3 crew
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: Constructive total loss/Pollution caused

Synopsis

The 9.85m fishing vessel capsized during a fishing trip in Pyefleet Creek, a narrow tributary of the River Colne.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents has made recommendations to the vessel's owner with reference to:

  • Vessel's stability

  • Use of personal buoyancy aids
